attributes.action: To introduce drink and drug testing to cabinet members and MP's in general
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
After the last couple of years of disastrous decisions from the government, some people could be forgiven for thinking that those in charge of us are either drunk or partaking of some illegal substances. 
It would be good if random drug testing was introduced for cabinet members and perhaps MP's in general. As the government seems to be so anti drugs then it is only right that they can prove they themselves are drink and drug free while trying to run this once prosperous country.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
